ARABIC: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But then when He tests him by restricting his provision, he says, 'My Lord has humiliated me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But when He tries him by restraining his means, he says: "My Lord despises me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But when He tests him by straitening his sustenance, he says: “My Lord has humiliated me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, when his Lord tests him by a measured amount of sustenance, he says, "God has disgraced me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if He tests him and restricts his livelihood – thereupon he says, “My Lord has degraded me!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But when He tries him by straitening his means of life, he says: "My Lord has humiliated me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But when He tries him (differently), then straitens to him his means of subsistence, he says: My Lord has disgraced me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But when he tries him and stints for him his provision, then he says, 'My Lord has despised me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whenever He trieth him by straitening his means of life, he saith: My Lord despiseth me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but when He tests him by straitening his means of livelihood, he says, "My Lord has disgraced me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when He proveth him, and so stinteth Unto him his provision, he saith: 'my Lord hath despised me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But when He tests him and tightens for him his provision, he says, ‘My Lord has humiliated me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But when He trieth him, restricting his subsistence for him, then saith he (in despair), "My Lord hath humiliated me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But when He tries him, by straitening his means of life, he says: "My Lord has humiliated me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But when He tests him by restricting his provision, he says: 'My Lord has humiliated me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But whenever He tests him, and restricts his livelihood for him, he says, “My Lord has insulted me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:16] But when he tests him and restricts his provision for him, he says, ‘My Lord has humiliated me’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But whenever He trieth him) whenever He tests him with poverty (by straitening his means of life) by tightening his means of living, (he saith: My Lord despiseth me) by giving me poverty and tightening my means of living.
